intent.user_query: What are the monthly sales trends, including total sales amount and number of sales, for the last 12 months?

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT  TRUNC(SaleDate, 'MM') AS SaleMonth, SUM(TotalAmount) AS TotalSalesAmount, COUNT(SaleID) AS NumberOfSales FROM fitness_db.Sales WHERE SaleDate >= ADD_MONTHS(CURRENT_DATE, -12) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

arguments.sql: SELECT  TRUNC(SaleDate, 'MM') AS SaleMonth, SUM(TotalAmount) AS TotalSalesAmount, COUNT(SaleID) AS NumberOfSales FROM fitness_db.Sales WHERE SaleDate >= ADD_MONTHS(CURRENT_DATE, -12) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
